content: **knitted halter-neck top in drops safran the piece is worked top down in stocking stitch sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #whitejasminetop drops design pattern e-377 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 200-200-200-250-250-250 g colour 72 chalk **needles** drops circular needle size 3 mm length 80 cm drops circular needle size 2 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 26 stitches in width and 34 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
